timeline.message:
Require Java 11.0.7+

Earlier versions are affected by JDK-8206955.

timeline.bodyText:
it's preexisting, but shall we treat Runtime.version() as the official version?
in some other places we use StandardSystemProperty.JAVA_VERSION.value(). Intentional?
